yarn.metrics.allocatedMB.name: yarn.metrics.allocatedMB
yarn.metrics.allocatedMB.definition: The amount of memory allocated in MB. If this is closed to totalMB, it is bad

yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB.name: yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB
yarn.nodes.usedMemoryMB.definition: The total amount of memory currently used on the node (in MB)

yarn.apps.allocatedMB.name: yarn.apps.allocatedMB
yarn.apps.allocatedMB.definition: The sum of memory in MB allocated to the application's running containers

yarn.apps.allocatedVCores.name: yarn.apps.allocatedVCores
yarn.apps.allocatedVCores.definition: The sum of virtual cores allocated to the application's running containers

yarn.apps.elapsedTime.name: yarn.apps.elapsedTime
yarn.apps.elapsedTime.definition: The elapsed time since the application started

yarn.apps.finishedTime.name: yarn.apps.finishedTime
yarn.apps.finishedTime.definition: The time in which the application finished

yarn.apps.memorySeconds.name: yarn.apps.memorySeconds
yarn.apps.memorySeconds.definition: The amount of memory the application has allocated

yarn.apps.progress.name: yarn.apps.progress
yarn.apps.progress.definition: The progress of the application as a percent

yarn.apps.runningContainers.name: yarn.apps.runningContainers
yarn.apps.runningContainers.definition: The number of containers currently running for the application

yarn.apps.startedTime.name: yarn.apps.startedTime
yarn.apps.startedTime.definition: The time in which application started

yarn.apps.vcoreSeconds.name: yarn.apps.vcoreSeconds
yarn.apps.vcoreSeconds.definition: The amount of CPU resources the application has allocated

yarn.metrics.allocatedVirtualCores.name: yarn.metrics.allocatedVirtualCores
yarn.metrics.allocatedVirtualCores.definition: The number of allocated virtual cores

yarn.metrics.availableMB.name: yarn.metrics.availableMB
yarn.metrics.availableMB.definition: The amount of memory available in MB

yarn.metrics.availableVirtualCores.name: yarn.metrics.availableVirtualCores
yarn.metrics.availableVirtualCores.definition: The number of available virtual cores

yarn.metrics.reservedMB.name: yarn.metrics.reservedMB
yarn.metrics.reservedMB.definition: The amount of memory reserved in MB

yarn.metrics.reservedVirtualCores.name: yarn.metrics.reservedVirtualCores
yarn.metrics.reservedVirtualCores.definition: The number of reserved virtual cores

yarn.metrics.totalMB.name: yarn.metrics.totalMB
yarn.metrics.totalMB.definition: The amount of total memory in MB

yarn.metrics.totalVirtualCores.name: yarn.metrics.totalVirtualCores
yarn.metrics.totalVirtualCores.definition: The total number of virtual cores

yarn.nodes.availMemoryMB.name: yarn.nodes.availMemoryMB
yarn.nodes.availMemoryMB.definition: TThe total amount of memory currently available on the node (in MB)

yarn.nodes.availableVirtualCores.name: yarn.nodes.availableVirtualCores
yarn.nodes.availableVirtualCores.definition: The total number of vCores available on the node

yarn.nodes.lastHealthUpdate.name: yarn.nodes.lastHealthUpdate
yarn.nodes.lastHealthUpdate.definition: The last time the node reported its health (in ms since epoch)

yarn.nodes.numContainers.name: yarn.nodes.numContainers
yarn.nodes.numContainers.definition: The total number of containers currently running on the node

yarn.nodes.usedVirtualCores.name: yarn.nodes.usedVirtualCores
yarn.nodes.usedVirtualCores.definition: The total number of vCores currently used on the node
